00020 using System;
00021 using System.Collections.Generic;
00022 using System.Text;
00023 using System.IO;
00024 using System.Security.Cryptography;
00025 using System.Diagnostics;
00026 
00027 namespace Crossfade
00028 {
00032         public class fiHash
00033         {
00034                 private string filename;
00035 
00036                 fiHash()
00037                 {
00038                 }
00039 
00045                 public fiHash(Uri file)
00046                 {
00047                         if (file.Scheme != Uri.UriSchemeFile)
00048                                 throw new ArgumentException("Unsupported Uri Schema!");
00049 
00050                         filename = file.LocalPath;
00051                 }
00052 
00059                 private FileStream GetFileStream(string pathName)
00060                 {
00061                         try
00062                         {
00063                                 return (new System.IO.FileStream(pathName, System.IO.FileMode.Open,
00064                                         System.IO.FileAccess.Read, System.IO.FileShare.ReadWrite));
00065                         }
00066                         catch (IOException ex)
00067                         {
00068                                 throw ex;
00069                         }
00070                 }
00071 
00075                 public string SHA256
00076                 {
00077                         get
00078                         {
00079                                 try
00080                                 {
00081                                         string strResult = "";
00082                                         string strHashData = "";
00083 
00084                                         byte[] arrbytHashValue;
00085                                         FileStream oFileStream = null;
00086 
00087                                         SHA1CryptoServiceProvider oSHA1Hasher =
00088                                                 new SHA1CryptoServiceProvider();
00089 
00090                                         oFileStream = GetFileStream(filename);
00091                                         arrbytHashValue = oSHA1Hasher.ComputeHash(oFileStream);
00092                                         oFileStream.Close();
00093 
00094                                         strHashData = System.BitConverter.ToString(arrbytHashValue);
00095                                         strHashData = strHashData.Replace("-", "");
00096                                         strResult = strHashData;
00097 
00098                                         return (strResult);
00099                                 }
00100                                 catch (IOException ex)
00101                                 {
00102                                         throw ex;
00103                                 }
00104 
00105                         }
00106                 }
00107         }
00108 }
